examples: The days passed slowly.
The time passed quickly.
The day and night passed slowly.
The feeling of sickness soon passed.
Unemployment has now passed the three million mark.
words.defineEn: to approach a specific place, object, or person and move past them
words.defineVi: để tiếp cận một địa điểm cụ thể, đối tượng, hoặc người và di chuyển qua chúng

examples: Cable TV reaches a huge audience.
Daytime temperatures can reach 40°C.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
This tree can reach a height of 24 metres.
Her popularity reached its peak in the late 1990s.
words.defineEn: to come to a certain level or state, or a specific point in time
words.defineVi: đạt đến một mức độ hoặc trạng thái nhất định, hoặc một thời điểm cụ thể

examples: Three days later a rash appeared.
Smoke appeared on the horizon.
A bus appeared around the corner.
Two faces appeared at our window.
Small cracks appeared in the wall.
words.defineEn: to become visible and noticeable
words.defineVi: để trở nên có thể nhìn thấy và đáng chú ý

examples: The apple tree in our backyard produces juicy fruits every year.
Violence in the last analysis produces more violence.
ur company mainly produces goods for export.
The local factory produces electronic components.
The company has just produced a luxury version of the aircraft.
words.defineEn: to make something using raw materials or different components
words.defineVi: để làm một cái gì đó bằng cách sử dụng nguyên liệu thô hoặc các thành phần khác nhau

examples: Evidence of their relationship exists in the form of a series of letters.
The hostages existed on bread and water.
Only a minority of people exist on unemployment benefits alone.
Dragons don’t exist.
Does life exist on other planets?
words.defineEn: to have a real presence in the world, either physically or conceptually
words.defineVi: để có một sự hiện diện thực sự trên thế giới, về thể chất hoặc khái niệm

examples: Import barriers protected the fledgling enterprises.
The plant is protected under the Wildlife and Countryside Act.
The body's immune system protects against harmful bacteria and viruses.
Many policies do not protect you against personal injury.
Polar bears have been protected by law in Norway since 1973.
words.defineEn: to prevent someone or something from being damaged or harmed
words.defineVi: để ngăn chặn một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó từ bị hư hỏng hoặc bị tổn hại

examples: The bank raised interest rates.
Many shops have raised their prices.
The piece raises the ghosts of a number of twentieth-century art ideas.
The book raises many important questions.
Local residents have raised concerns about late-night noise.
words.defineEn: to put something in a higher place or lift it to a higher position
words.defineVi: để đặt một cái gì đó ở một nơi cao hơn hoặc nâng nó lên một vị trí cao hơn

examples: At last the wind dropped.
Her eyes dropped to her lap.
I dropped another plate!
His voice dropped to a whisper.
The spoon dropped with a clatter from her hand.
words.defineEn: to let or make something fall to the ground
words.defineVi: để cho hoặc làm cho một cái gì đó rơi xuống đất

examples: Any investment involves an element of risk.
His confession involved a number of other politicians in the affair.
What will the job involve?
These changes will involve everyone on the staff.
Parents should involve themselves in their child's education.
words.defineEn: to contain or include something as a necessary part
words.defineVi: để chứa hoặc bao gồm một cái gì đó như là một phần cần thiết

examples: The restaurant served their fish and chips with a side of brown sauce.
The street vendor served crispy trotter bites with a tangy dipping sauce at the food market.
The center will serve the whole community.
The bartender served a cocktail in a fancy glass.
The restaurant served a mouthwatering plate of spaghetti with bolognese pasta sauce.
words.defineEn: to give someone food or drink
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho một ai đó thực phẩm hoặc đồ uống

examples: On the credit side, the restaurant offers a wide range of choices.
Italy's Mediterranean climate and diverse geography offer a wide range of outdoor activities
The store sometimes offers discounts on certain items.
The vegetarian menu offers a delicious black bean burrito as a protein-packed option.
The textile store offers bolts of various fabrics, from cotton to linen.
words.defineEn: to present or propose something to someone
words.defineVi: để trình bày hoặc đề xuất một cái gì đó cho một ai đó

examples: I draw the line at a pizza with anchovies on it.
She drew a yellow sun on the corner of the paper.
She drew a picture of a hand with five fingers.
he battle lines has been drawn for years.
The battle lines were drawn yesterday for the fiercest contest in the history of local radio.
words.defineEn: to make a picture of something using a pencil, pen, etc. without painting it
words.defineVi: để tạo ra một bức tranh về một cái gì đó bằng bút chì, bút mực, v.v. mà không vẽ nó

examples: Roll cellophane noodles, veggies, and shrimp in rice paper for tasty summer rolls.
Heads are rolling all over the place.
Heads will have to roll at board level.
When the boss finds out about the mistake, heads will roll.
I rolled the dice on a tool brand I haven't used before.
words.defineEn: to move in a direction by turning over and over or from one side to another repeatedly
words.defineVi: di chuyển theo một hướng bằng cách quay đi quay lại hoặc từ bên này sang bên kia nhiều lần

examples: The question requires critical thinking and analysis.
The slow healing process of the wound required regular care.
Harvesting abalone for culinary purposes requires sustainable practices to ensure the long-term survival of it.
The passport application requires you to fill in your first name, middle name, and last name.
Pupils are required to sit nine subjects at GCSE.
words.defineEn: to need or demand something as necessary in a particular situation
words.defineVi: cần hoặc yêu cầu một cái gì đó khi cần thiết trong một tình huống cụ thể

examples: The slow healing process of the wound required regular care.
Goodbye, take care of yourself.
She will need around-the-clock care for the rest of her life.
I could care less about award shows.
The zookeepers took special care of the baby elephant, ensuring its healthy growth.
words.defineEn: to consider something or someone important and to have a feeling of worry or concern toward them
words.defineVi: để coi một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó quan trọng và có một cảm giác lo lắng hoặc quan tâm đối với họ

examples: The colorful bird flew high in the sky.
"And pigs can fly!"
The airplane flew through the clouds on its way to the destination.
a black raven is flying across the night sky.
Birds can fly freely in the sky.
words.defineEn: to move or travel through the air
words.defineVi: để di chuyển hoặc đi du lịch trong không khí

examples: I picked a bouquet of fresh flowers from the field.
He often picks a quarrel.
Take your pick.
She sometimes picked fights with other girls at school.
I picked a handful of delicious sand cherries from the bush in my backyard.
words.defineEn: to choose someone or something out of a group of people or things
words.defineVi: để chọn một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó trong số một nhóm người hoặc vật

examples: The construction worker used a heavy-duty bolt to connect the steel beams.
There's been some monkey business connected with his tax returns.
He is raising their spirits and giving them opportunities while connecting them with nature.
It's an opportunity to network and connect with everybody who is anybody in the high society.
The popular new social media platform left its rivals in the dust, attracting millions of users and revolutionizing the way people connect and share information online.
words.defineEn: to join two or more things together; to be joined together
words.defineVi: nối hai hay nhiều thứ lại với nhau; được kết hợp với nhau

examples: The film caught a cold over the outstanding debt.
A vase on a side table caught his eye.
The new law caught them unawares.
He caught a glimpse of his reflection in the glass.
As she turned back, a movement across the lawn caught her eye.
words.defineEn: to stop and hold an object that is moving through the air by hands
words.defineVi: để dừng lại và giữ một đối tượng đang di chuyển trong không khí bằng tay

examples: The nuclear power plant released a small amount of radiation into the atmosphere after the incident.
Its release hasreally raised the ante on the story telling in video games.
The European Community had even released lists of American unfair trade practices, paying us back in our own coin.
The singer is in the spotlight for her new album release.
She squeezed the orange, releasing the refreshing pulp into her glass.
words.defineEn: to let someone leave a place in which they have been confined or stuck
words.defineVi: để cho ai đó rời khỏi một nơi mà họ đã bị giam cầm hoặc bị mắc kẹt

examples: Shergar film falls at the first fence in Cannes.
Underneath the orange tree, the leaves gently fall.
The fall knocked the wind out of me.
The leaves fall from the trees in autumn.
People are falling like flies from COVID-19.
words.defineEn: to quickly move from a high place toward the ground
words.defineVi: để nhanh chóng di chuyển từ một nơi cao xuống đất

examples: The young actress received an award for her outstanding performance.
The film received lavish praise from critics for its groundbreaking visual effects, compelling storyline, and outstanding performances.
Offenders should receive their just deserts.
The hardworking employee received a promotion for their exceptional performance.
She received a missed call from an unknown phone number.
words.defineEn: to be given something or to accept something that is sent
words.defineVi: để được đưa ra một cái gì đó hoặc để chấp nhận một cái gì đó được gửi

examples: The book describes her life from cradle to grave.
But the lawyers also described internal politics that at times slowed down the department's work or drove a wedge among members of the team.
And after the match, the Carlisle boss wasn't pulling his punches when describing his players' performance.
BBC is falling over backwards to be impartial by describing this as a crowd!
It was described as a large, luxury mobile home, but there was barely room to swing a cat.
words.defineEn: to give details about someone or something to say what they are like
words.defineVi: để cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó để nói họ như thế nào

examples: He never shot a line about his escapades.
New shoots are just appearing at the base of the plant.
We've been shooting the breeze for well over an hour now.
He is shooting from the hip in an act of political desperation.
As a chef, I add bamboo shoots to my signature soup for a delightful twist.
words.defineEn: to release a bullet or arrow from a gun or bow
words.defineVi: để giải phóng một viên đạn hoặc mũi tên từ một khẩu súng hoặc cung

examples: These heroes courageously answered the call of duty.
The waiter patiently answered our questions about the ingredients in the dish.
Her answer is no.
No one knows the answer.
She guessed the answer straight away.
words.defineEn: to say, write or do something as a reaction or reply to a question or situation
words.defineVi: nói, viết hoặc làm điều gì đó như một phản ứng hoặc trả lời cho một câu hỏi hoặc tình huống
